introduction.msg_list: Before we begin the ParentText programme, we must learn to take a pause. 💚
importance.msg_list: Taking a pause will help you manage stress and be more able to take care of others and yourself.🌱
comic.intro: Let's practice taking a pause together.
comic.text.1:
1️⃣ *SIT DOWN*

⏸  Find a place where you can sit comfortably.

⭐ You can close your eyes if you’d like.
comic.text.2:
2️⃣ *LISTEN*

🌱 Take a deep breath.

👂 Feel  the air moving in and out of your body.

🔄 Repeat this 5 times.
comic.text.3:
3️⃣ *NOTICE*

✨ Notice how your body feels while you breathe.

🔵 Notice where you feel tension in your body and try to let it go.
comic.text.4:
4️⃣ *OPEN YOUR EYES*

👀 When you are ready, open your eyes.

🔑 Notice if you feel any different than when you started this activity.
tips.intro: Try taking a pause whenever you feel angry, overwhelmed, stressed or worried. ⏰ Even a few deep breaths or connecting with the ground beneath you can make a difference. You can also take a pause with Your Teen!
video.message: Let’s take a pause, together. ▶️Press Play
audio.message: Let’s take a pause, together. ▶️Press Play
congratulations.msg_list: Well done! You have learnt how to take a pause!
